owl:Ontology.terms:creator: Aitor Corchero
owl:Ontology.terms:description: A SAREF4WATR extenstion to model incidence, emergency response and Risk Assessment modelling. The main intention of the ontology is to interlink water management information with water quality and risk assessment. This ontology has been elaborated under the PATHOCERT H2020 project.
owl:Ontology.terms:title: Incidence, Emergency Response and Risk Assessment model

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship specifying the devices that control a feature of interest.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: feature is controlled by device

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship specifying the devices that measure a feature of interest.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: feature is measured by device

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The time for which the value of a measurement applies to the feature of interest.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has phenomenon time

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The type of water for which an infrastructure is designed for.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is designed for

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The intended use of the infrastructure.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is intended for

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship identifying the manufacturer of an entity (e.g., device)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has manufacturer

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The fabrication number of a device.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has fabrication number

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The firmware version of a device.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has firmware version

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The hardware version of a device.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has hardware version

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The radio frequency at which a device operates.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: operates at radio frequency

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The power required by a device.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: requires power

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This class represents the top-level feature type. This class is equivalent to GFI_Feature defined in ISO 19156:2011, and it is superclass of all feature types.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Feature

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class represents the top-level geometry type. This class is equivalent to the UML class GM_Object defined in ISO 19107, and it is superclass of all geometry types.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Geometry

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The day of week.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Day of week

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A temporal entity with zero extent or duration
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Instant

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A temporal entity with an extent or duration.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Interval

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Time extent; duration of a time interval separate from its particular start position
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Temporal duration

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A temporal interval or instant.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Temporal entity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A device responsible for moving or controlling a mechanism or system.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Actuator

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A tangible object designed to accomplish a particular task in households, common public buildings or offices. In order to accomplish this task, the device performs one or more functions. For example, a washing machine is designed to wash (task) and to accomplish this task it performs a start and stop function. Devices can be structured in categories (subclasses) that reflect the different domain in which a device is used, e.g., smart appliances domain (subclass FunctionRelated) vs. building domain (subclass BuildingRelated) vs. smart grid domain (subclass EnergyRelated). New categories can be defined,if needed, to reflect other differences, for example different points of view, such as the point of view of the device's user vs. the point of view of the device's manufacturer. We propose a list of devices that are relevant for the purpose of SAREF, but this list can be extended.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Device

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Represents the measured value made over a property. It is also linked to the unit of measure in which the value is expressed and the timestamp of the measurement.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Measurement

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A device built to accurately detect and display a quantity in a form readable by a human being. Further, a device of category saref:Meter that performs a saref:MeteringFunction.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Meter

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An aspect of an entity that can be observable by a sensor.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Property

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A device that detects and responds to events or changes in the physical environment such as light, motion, or temperature changes. A device that has category saref:Sensor and performs a saref:SensingFunction.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Sensor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The unit of measure is a standard for measurement of a quantity, such as a Property. For example, Power is a property and Watt is a unit of power that represents a definite predetermined power: when we say 10 Watt, we actually mean 10 times the definite predetermined power called "watt". Our definition is based on the definition of unit of measure in the Ontology of units of Measure (OM). We propose here a list of some units of measure that are relevant for the purpose of the Smart Appliances ontology, but this list can be extended.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Unit of measure

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An acceptability property is a property of water that is related to its acceptability.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Acceptability property

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A chemical property is a property of water that is related to chemical components.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ChemicalProperty

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A microbial property is a property of water that is related to microbes.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Microbial property

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A pump is a device for moving water by mechanical action.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Pump

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A valve is a device designed to control water flow, pressure or volume.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Valve

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This class is used to define a particular quantity or body of water.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Water

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A water asset is a physical entity used in the process of transporting, treating, storing and distributing water.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Water asset

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A water device is a device that is also a water asset.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Water device

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class to group those properties related to water flow.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Water flow property

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A water infrastructure is the set of facilities, services, and installations needed for water management.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Water infrastructure

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A water meter is an instrument intended to measure continuously, memorize, and display the volume of water passing through the meter.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Water meter

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class to group those properties related to water meters.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Water meter property

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class to group those properties related to the water.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Water property

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: NGSI-LD Entity
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Entity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: NGSI-LD Property
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Property

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: NGSI-LD Relationship
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Relationship

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This class is used to define a particular air medium.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Air

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A air borne disease is a disease transferred by air
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Air-Borne

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A Bacteria property is a property of water that is related to specific bacterias.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bacteria property

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A Biological property is a property of water that is related to biological contaminants and pathogens.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Biological property

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: a interaction situation that permit to do specific actions over a system or feature of interest.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Control Actions

owl:Class.rdf:comment: A digital tool corresponds to a digital device that offer digital services (information) to monitor water infrastructure.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Digital Tool

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A collection of diseases that can be transferred by different vectors.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Disease

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: a interaction situation that permit to create specific event
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Event Affordance

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: a interaction situation between users of digial services .
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Interaction Affordance

owl:Class.rdf:comment: A modelling tool is a hydrometereological tool that permit to make simulations and prediction over water infrastructure.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Modelling Tools

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: a interaction situation that performs an specific notification
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Notification Affordance

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A PFAS property is a property of water that is related to PFAS.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: PFAS property

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A parasites property is a property of water that is related to specific parasites.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Parasites property

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A pharmatheutical property is a property of water that is related to specific emerging contaminants.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Pharmatheutical property

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A Protozoan property is a property of water that is related to specific protozoos.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Protozoan property

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: a situation involving exposure to danger.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Risk

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A vector borne disease is a disease transferred by animals and ecosystems
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Vector-Borne

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A Virus property is a property of water that is related to specific virus.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Virus property

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Weakness in an information system, system security procedures, internal controls, or implementation that could be exploited or triggered by a threat source
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Vulnerability

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A water borne disease is a disease transferred by water
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Water-Borne

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An entity to simulate and predict water quality parameters, including their dispersion
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Water Monitoring Tool

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An An aspect of an entity that can be observable by a sensor.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Water Quality Property

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An entity to measure water quality parameters.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Water Quality Sensor
